public.current_documents.definition: select distinct "id", "document_id", "collection_id", "path", "event_type", "status", "is_deleted", "created_at", "updated_at", "created_by", "change_summary" from "documents" where "documents"."is_deleted" = false order by "documents"."collection_id", "documents"."document_id", "documents"."id" desc
public.current_documents.name: current_documents
